text: The Saint Cyr Range is a remote mountain range in the Yukon, Canada. It has an area of 6224 km2 and is a subrange of the Pelly Mountains which in turn form part of the Yukon Ranges.Saint Cyr Range in the Canadian Mountain Encyclopedia ==See also== *List of mountain ranges *Mount Atherton [105K/4] * Rose Mountain [105K/5] * Mount Mye [105K/6] ==References== Category:Mountain ranges of Yukon
title: Saint Cyr Range
